casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Joseph T. Mahle, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 70-73;Third DistrictNovember 22, 1972.James Geis, of Defender Project, of Ottawa, for appellant.Howard Augustus, Assistant State’s Attorney, of Ottawa, for the People.

Rehearing denied February 20, 1973.

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE ALLOY.
